text: Stanford "Stan" M. Adelstein (born August 19, 1931) is an American politician and engineer. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was in the South Dakota House of Representatives from 2001 to 2005, and later retired from the South Dakota Senate, where he represented the 32nd district from 2005 to 2007 and again from 2008 to 2013. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Living people Category:American civil engineers Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Scientists from Iowa Category:Scientists from South Dakota Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Politicians from South Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Stan Adelstein
